description.english: Reaching the Digital Kingdom is quite an achievement
description.german: Das Digitale Königreich zu erreichen ist schon eine ordentliche Leistung
description.french: Atteindre le Royaume Numérique est un exploit remarquable
description.koreana: 디지털 왕국에 도착하는 것은 상당한 업적입니다
description.spanish: Llegar al Reino Digital es todo un logro
description.schinese: 抵达数字王国就是个很值得纪念的成就了
description.tchinese: 抵達數位王國就是一項相當非凡的成就了
description.russian: Путешествие по Digital Kingdom — истинный подвиг
description.japanese: デジタルキングダムに足を踏み入れること、それだけでも立派な実績だ
description.brazilian: Chegar ao Reino Digital é uma conquista e tanto

displayName.french: Comme les deux doigts de la main

description.english: Wield the Techno Sword and become one with it to overthrow the Stallions
description.german: Führe das Techno-Schwert und werde eins damit, um die Stallions zu besiegen
description.french: Maniez la Technoépée pour ne faire plus qu'Un avec elle afin de renverser les Étalons
description.koreana: 테크노 소드를 휘둘러 스탈리온을 정복자 되기
description.spanish: Empuña la Tecno Espada y fúndete con ella para derrotar a los Stallion
description.schinese: 与科技之剑人剑合一，对抗战马大军
description.tchinese: 與科技寶劍人劍合一，對抗戰馬大軍
description.russian: Получите Techno Sword и станьте с ним единым целым, чтобы одолеть Stallions
description.japanese: テクノソードを引き抜き、剣を操りスタリオンどもをやっつけろ
description.brazilian: Empunhe a Tecno-espada e integre-se a ela para vencer os Stallions
